p: A. trifoliatus leaf is a good source of essential nutrients including protein, carbohydrate, dietary fiber, and fat. It also contains health-promoting compounds including vitamins and minerals, especially calcium. Moreover, ethanolic A. trifoliatus leaf extract had antioxidant and anticancer potentials. For antioxidant capacity, ORAC value and FRAP value were found to be 9057.29 ± 43.08 and 1230.88 ± 19.51 μmol TE/100 g, respectively. For cytotoxic activity, its leaves' extract possessed cytotoxic activities against all tested cancer cell lines.
